value.name: Length
value.hint: The number of rolls to keep in history for each user. Note: No rolls will be nudged until a user's history length reaches this value.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: When enabled this will set the lower threshold for when rolls will be nudged upwards.

value.name: Value
value.hint: The average roll based on a user's history needs to be below or equal to this amount before it will nudge their dice upward.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: When enabled this will set the upper threshold for when rolls will be nudged downwards.

value.name: Value
value.hint: The average roll based on a user's history needs to be above or equal to this amount before it will nudge their dice downward.

value.name: Value
value.hint: The amount to nudge a user's dice upwards or downwards.

cumulative.name: Cumulative
cumulative.hint: The amount a user's dice is nudged is multiplied by the number of times it has had to nudge their dice in a row.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: When enabled this will adjust rerolls using a Hero Point using the below settings. If a reroll is adjusted then it will not attempt to see if the roll is above or below the treshold to be nudged.

value.name: Value
value.hint: The amount to add to the natural result of a reroll using a Hero Point when the threshold is met.

threshold.name: Threshold
threshold.hint: If the natural result of a reroll using a Hero Point is below or equal to this amount, then the result will be adjusted.
